term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - dispersion in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: dispersion

item.text: The dilution of a pollutant by spreading in the atmosphere due to diffusion or turbulent action (eddydiffusion).

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2185 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
